venue.name: Boston Public Library -Johnson Building (Concourse Level, Room 5)

item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Thank you for supporting our organization from last 4 years.  In this journey of  4 years we reached 5200+ volunteers with more than 850 meetup volunteer events. This wouldn't possible without you, we appreciate your support to the non-profit during this journey.

Now as an organization, we decided to move one more step and organize huge  charity events in Boston area to support the local organizations and do the most good to the fellow Bostonians.

Our first event is  PET/ANIMAL welfare charity event, this is a massive event involving lot of pets and requires lot of planning and thorough execution. We are actively seeking volunteers and pet lovers to join the movement. Here are the volunteer postions available:

  1. Campaigning and Public Relations
  2. Social Networking and publicity
  3. Event Website development and maintenance.
  4. Event Organizers
  5. Volunteer co-ordinators
  6. Accounting
  7. Active Volunteers or pet lovers

This is just one event in Summer 2013 which needs lot of volunteers. This just needs a little time from each volunteer to execute our ideas and support to the community.

If you interested to volunteer or give some ideas or support the project, please join us at

Boston Public Library, Johnson Building, Concourse Level, Room .

Address: 700 Boylston Street, Boston, MA at 6 30 PM.

Lets go dinner after the meeting.

Thank you and see you soon.

Phani and Josh

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer and Pet lovers meet for the BV's Pet Charity Event, Summer 2013
